mapper.select: select SD_ID, APP_ID, CRT_TIME, PROPOSED_LMT, APP_SCORE, APP_SCORE_LVL, REVOLVING_LMT, APP_CHANNEL, OP_ACCT_DT, SUPPLEMENT_RST, SUPPLEMENT_RST_DSCP, FQZ_RST, FQZ_RST_DESP, CP_RST, CP_RST_DESP, PBOC_RST, PBOC_RST_FIN, APP_SCORE_RST, APP_SCORE_RST_FIN, CIF_AGE, IS_HAVE_PBOC, IS_HAVE_LOANCARD, TT_PAY_RATE, PAY, PAY_DUE, REVOLVING_LABEL, CIF_LABEL, LOWEST_PAY_AMT_LABEL, FREE_PAY_TERM_LABEL, ACCFUND_INCOME, COMFIRM_AMT, ADB_AMT, CS_LOAN_AMT, CITY_TYP, AVG_MOB, ONE_CARD_MOB, RISK_LVL, APP_LABLE, CARD_ACTIV_TIMES, MAX_RC_CRIDIT_LMT, MAX_RC_CHARE_LMT, MAX_RC_CARD_MOB, MAX_CS_LOAN_MOB, HAVE_CC_USE_RECORD, HAVE_CL_USE_RECORD, INCOME_AMT, OTHER_BANK_AMT, PAY_AMT, EDU_AMT, HOUSE_AMT, CAR_AMT, OTHER_BANK_MAX_LMT, OTHER_BANK_CREDIT_LMT, IS_MASTER_CUST_APP, IS_NEW_CUST_APP, CUST_TYPE, IS_SPECIAL_CUST, GJM_CD, JUJ_CD, DTI, DL_LMT, CARDORLOANACCTSTATUSABL, CREDITCARD12MDUEABL, CREDITCARD3MDUEABL, CARDORLOAN3MDUEABL, LOANCARDDUEABL, LOAN12MDUEABL, LOAN3MDUEABL, NEWLOANCARDACCTCOUNTABL, LOANCARDAMTUSERATIOABL, CARDLOANSELECTCOUNTABL, CREDITCARDCOUNTABL, RZ_LABLE, IS_HX_EMP, IS_HX_XYK_EMP, TEMP_DECISIONRESULT, MAIN_ROLLING_LABEL, MAIN_ROLLING_RESULT, DECISION_RESULT, DECISION_DESP, INTEREST_RATE_PRODUCT, CUST_TYPE_DESP, RC_CC_CL_12M_NOT_ACTION, RZ_RESULT, RZ_DESP, LOANDUEABL, APP_SCORE_RST_DESP, APP_SCORE_RST_FIN_DESP, PBOC_RST_DESP, PBOC_RST_FIN_DESP, WF_RESULT, YSX_AMT, JINGDONG_AMT, CUT_OFF_DIRECTION, HISTORY_PROPOSED_LMT, IND_CD_RST from OPAS_FICO_SD_BLAZE where SD_ID = #{sdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select s.APP_ID, s.CRT_TIME, s.app_score, (select d.IRB_SCORE from OPAS_FICO_SCOREINFO_RESULT d where d.app_id = s.app_id) as IRB_SCORE, s.TRIGGER_TYPE, s.DECISION_RESULT, s.DECISION_DESP, s.PROPOSED_LMT, (select o.CREDIT_DECISION_RESULT from OPAS_BZK_SYSRESULT_INFO o where o.app_id = s.app_id) as CREDIT_DECISION_RESULT, (select o.CREDIT_DECISION_DESC from OPAS_BZK_SYSRESULT_INFO o where o.app_id = s.app_id) as CREDIT_DECISION_DESC, (select p.prod_name from opas_param_card_product p where p.card_code = s.cp_rst) as Cp_Rst, s.SUPPLEMENT_RST, s.SUPPLEMENT_RST_DSCP, s.COMFIRM_AMT, s.DTI, s.DL_LMT, (select e.C1_CREDPCT from OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C2 e where e.APP_ID = s.app_id) as C1_CREDPCT, s.APP_LABLE, s.RZ_LABLE, s.RZ_LABLE_CODE, s.JUJ_CD, s.CIF_LABEL as cust_level_tag_a, s.RATE_CODE as RATE_NAME, s.LOWEST_PAY_AMT_LABEL as cust_level_tag_b, return_Value(s.APP_ID,'2',s.LOWEST_PAY_AMT_LABEL) as REPAY_RATIO_VALUE, s.FREE_PAY_TERM_LABEL as cust_level_tag_c, return_Value(s.APP_ID,'3',s.FREE_PAY_TERM_LABEL) as repay_free_value, s.VIGILANT_CUST,s.SPECIAL_CUST, s.RATE_CODE_VALID_TIME as cust_level_tag_d, return_Value(s.APP_ID,'4','LLDMSXRQ') as RATE_VALUE_LOSE_DATE
from OPAS_FICO_SD_BLAZE s where s.APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.SD_ID, a.APP_ID, a.CRT_TIME, a.PROPOSED_LMT, a.APP_SCORE, a.APP_SCORE_LVL, a.REVOLVING_LMT, a.APP_CHANNEL, a.TRIGGER_TYPE, a.OP_ACCT_DT, a.SUPPLEMENT_RST, a.SUPPLEMENT_RST_DSCP, a.FQZ_RST, a.FQZ_RST_DESP, a.CP_RST, a.CP_RST_DESP, a.PBOC_RST, a.PBOC_RST_FIN, a.APP_SCORE_RST, a.APP_SCORE_RST_FIN, a.CIF_AGE, a.IS_HAVE_PBOC, a.IS_HAVE_LOANCARD, a.TT_PAY_RATE, a.PAY, a.PAY_DUE, a.REVOLVING_LABEL, a.CIF_LABEL, a.LOWEST_PAY_AMT_LABEL, a.FREE_PAY_TERM_LABEL, a.ACCFUND_INCOME, a.COMFIRM_AMT, a.ADB_AMT, a.CS_LOAN_AMT, a.CITY_TYP, a.AVG_MOB, a.ONE_CARD_MOB, a.RISK_LVL, a.APP_LABLE, a.CARD_ACTIV_TIMES, a.MAX_RC_CRIDIT_LMT, a.MAX_RC_CHARE_LMT, a.MAX_RC_CARD_MOB, a.MAX_CS_LOAN_MOB, a.HAVE_CC_USE_RECORD, a.HAVE_CL_USE_RECORD, a.INCOME_AMT, a.OTHER_BANK_AMT, a.PAY_AMT, a.EDU_AMT, a.HOUSE_AMT, a.CAR_AMT, a.OTHER_BANK_MAX_LMT, a.OTHER_BANK_CREDIT_LMT, a.IS_MASTER_CUST_APP, a.IS_NEW_CUST_APP, a.CUST_TYPE, a.IS_SPECIAL_CUST, a.GJM_CD, a.JUJ_CD, a.DTI, a.DL_LMT, a.CARDORLOANACCTSTATUSABL, a.CREDITCARD12MDUEABL, a.CREDITCARD3MDUEABL, a.CARDORLOAN3MDUEABL, a.LOANCARDDUEABL, a.LOAN12MDUEABL, a.LOAN3MDUEABL, a.NEWLOANCARDACCTCOUNTABL, a.LOANCARDAMTUSERATIOABL, a.CARDLOANSELECTCOUNTABL, a.CREDITCARDCOUNTABL, a.RZ_LABLE, a.IS_HX_EMP, a.IS_HX_XYK_EMP, a.TEMP_DECISIONRESULT, a.MAIN_ROLLING_LABEL, a.MAIN_ROLLING_RESULT, a.DECISION_RESULT, a.DECISION_DESP, a.INTEREST_RATE_PRODUCT, a.CUST_TYPE_DESP, a.RC_CC_CL_12M_NOT_ACTION, a.RZ_RESULT, a.RZ_DESP, a.LOANDUEABL, a.APP_SCORE_RST_DESP, a.APP_SCORE_RST_FIN_DESP, a.PBOC_RST_DESP, a.PBOC_RST_FIN_DESP, a.WF_RESULT, a.YSX_AMT, a.JINGDONG_AMT, a.CUT_OFF_DIRECTION, a.HISTORY_PROPOSED_LMT, a.IND_CD_RST, a.POLICY_CODE1,a.POLICY_CODE3,a.RZ_LABLE_CODE,b.C1_CREDPCT,c.prod_name,a.RATE_CODE as RATE_NAME,d.C4_ABTYPE from OPAS_FICO_SD_BLAZE a left join OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C2 b on a.app_id=b.app_id left join opas_param_card_product c on a.cp_rst = c.card_code left join OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C1 d on a.app_id=d.app_id where a.APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select APP_ID, PROPOSED_LMT from OPAS_FICO_SD_BLAZE where APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into OPAS_FICO_SD_BLAZE (SD_ID, APP_ID, CRT_TIME, PROPOSED_LMT, APP_SCORE, APP_SCORE_LVL, REVOLVING_LMT, APP_CHANNEL, OP_ACCT_DT, SUPPLEMENT_RST, SUPPLEMENT_RST_DSCP, FQZ_RST, FQZ_RST_DESP, CP_RST, CP_RST_DESP, PBOC_RST, PBOC_RST_FIN, APP_SCORE_RST, APP_SCORE_RST_FIN, CIF_AGE, IS_HAVE_PBOC, IS_HAVE_LOANCARD, TT_PAY_RATE, PAY, PAY_DUE, REVOLVING_LABEL, CIF_LABEL, LOWEST_PAY_AMT_LABEL, FREE_PAY_TERM_LABEL, ACCFUND_INCOME, COMFIRM_AMT, ADB_AMT, CS_LOAN_AMT, CITY_TYP, AVG_MOB, ONE_CARD_MOB, RISK_LVL, APP_LABLE, CARD_ACTIV_TIMES, MAX_RC_CRIDIT_LMT, MAX_RC_CHARE_LMT, MAX_RC_CARD_MOB, MAX_CS_LOAN_MOB, HAVE_CC_USE_RECORD, HAVE_CL_USE_RECORD, INCOME_AMT, OTHER_BANK_AMT, PAY_AMT, EDU_AMT, HOUSE_AMT, CAR_AMT, OTHER_BANK_MAX_LMT, OTHER_BANK_CREDIT_LMT, IS_MASTER_CUST_APP, IS_NEW_CUST_APP, CUST_TYPE, IS_SPECIAL_CUST, GJM_CD, JUJ_CD, DTI, DL_LMT, CARDORLOANACCTSTATUSABL, CREDITCARD12MDUEABL, CREDITCARD3MDUEABL, CARDORLOAN3MDUEABL, LOANCARDDUEABL, LOAN12MDUEABL, LOAN3MDUEABL, NEWLOANCARDACCTCOUNTABL, LOANCARDAMTUSERATIOABL, CARDLOANSELECTCOUNTABL, CREDITCARDCOUNTABL, RZ_LABLE, IS_HX_EMP, IS_HX_XYK_EMP, TEMP_DECISIONRESULT, MAIN_ROLLING_LABEL, MAIN_ROLLING_RESULT, DECISION_RESULT, DECISION_DESP, INTEREST_RATE_PRODUCT, CUST_TYPE_DESP, RC_CC_CL_12M_NOT_ACTION, RZ_RESULT, RZ_DESP, LOANDUEABL, APP_SCORE_RST_DESP, APP_SCORE_RST_FIN_DESP, PBOC_RST_DESP, PBOC_RST_FIN_DESP, WF_RESULT, YSX_AMT, JINGDONG_AMT, CUT_OFF_DIRECTION, HISTORY_PROPOSED_LMT, IND_CD_RST ) values (#{sdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{proposedLmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{appScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{appScoreLvl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{revolvingLmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{appChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update OPAS_FICO_SD_BLAZE
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PROPOSED_LMT = #{proposedLmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APP_SCORE = #{appScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APP_SCORE_LVL = #{appScoreLvl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REVOLVING_LMT = #{revolvingLmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APP_CHANNEL = #{appChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OP_ACCT_DT = #{opAcctDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLEMENT_RST = #{supplementRst,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLEMENT_RST_DSCP = #{supplementRstDscp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FQZ_RST = #{fqzRst,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FQZ_RST_DESP = #{fqzRstDesp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CP_RST = #{cpRst,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CP_RST_DESP = #{cpRstDesp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PBOC_RST = #{pbocRst,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PBOC_RST_FIN = #{pbocRstFin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_SCORE_RST = #{appScoreRst,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_SCORE_RST_FIN = #{appScoreRstFin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CIF_AGE = #{cifAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_HAVE_PBOC = #{isHavePboc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_HAVE_LOANCARD = #{isHaveLoancard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TT_PAY_RATE = #{ttPayRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAY = #{pay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAY_DUE = #{payDue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REVOLVING_LABEL = #{revolvingLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CIF_LABEL = #{cifLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOWEST_PAY_AMT_LABEL = #{lowestPayAmtLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FREE_PAY_TERM_LABEL = #{freePayTermLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCFUND_INCOME = #{accfundIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMFIRM_AMT = #{comfirmAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADB_AMT = #{adbAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CS_LOAN_AMT = #{csLoanAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CITY_TYP = #{cityTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AVG_MOB = #{avgMob,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ONE_CARD_MOB = #{oneCardMob,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RISK_LVL = #{riskLvl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APP_LABLE = #{appLable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_ACTIV_TIMES = #{cardActivTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MAX_RC_CRIDIT_LMT = #{maxRcCriditLmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MAX_RC_CHARE_LMT = #{maxRcChareLmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MAX_RC_CARD_MOB = #{maxRcCardMob,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MAX_CS_LOAN_MOB = #{maxCsLoanMob,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HAVE_CC_USE_RECORD = #{haveCcUseRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HAVE_CL_USE_RECORD = #{haveClUseRecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INCOME_AMT = #{incomeAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OTHER_BANK_AMT = #{otherBankAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAY_AMT = #{payAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EDU_AMT = #{eduAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HOUSE_AMT = #{houseAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CAR_AMT = #{carAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

OTHER_BANK_CREDIT_LMT = #{otherBankSecondLmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

mapper.select: select a.dict_detail_code as cityCode from opas_ap_dict_detail a where a.dict_id =(select b.dict_id from (select d.dict_id,rownum from opas_ap_dict d where d.dict_code='BZDL') b where rownum=1)

select a.CRT_TIME from opas_fico_ydj_blaze a
a.APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum = 1
